title: Real Estate VA
job_overview:
For the full application, please submit here: Upgrade to see actual info

Please refer to our job scorecard, as this is what our interviewers will be using to take notes during your interview process.

Traditional VA Tasks
Calendar management
 
Email management
Making and receiving calls 
Scheduling appointments
Capturing the minutes of the meeting
Organizing or summarizing notes
Researching 

Real Estate Specific Tasks
Interact with the Property Management Team
Creating Reports based on Data from the Property Management Team
Assisting in the analysis of properties during the acquisition stage

Payments will be handled through OnlineJobs.PH
